definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: With Basecamp, just sign up and use it right away.
sentences.chinese: 隨著大本營，只要註冊並使用它的權利了。

sentences.english: With the aid of the Hunter, the Horse soon overcame the Stag.
sentences.chinese: 隨著援助的獵人，馬很快戰勝了雄鹿。

sentences.english: Stay with the sensation of infinite space that comes along with the perception.
sentences.chinese: 定在隨著那個辨識而來的無限空間感中。

sentences.english: Along with that knowledge came an understanding of how to lead a meaningful and compassionate life.
sentences.chinese: 隨著這些了悟，他知道如何過具有意義與慈悲的生活。

sentences.english: As the government of the South Sung Dynasty stabilized, the bowmen were removed during the 4th year of Shaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 隨著南宋政權趨於穩定，紹興四年高宗罷廢新置弓手。

sentences.english: Blood spurted as the conveyer belt moved on.
sentences.chinese: 隨著傳送帶向前移動，鮮血噴射出來了。

sentences.english: However, not long after the necrosis of their organs, these reactions will disappear too.
sentences.chinese: 不過，隨著器官的壞死，不消多久這些反應也會消失。

sentences.english: I was dancing with my darling to the Tennessee Waltz.
sentences.chinese: 我與愛人隨著田納西華爾滋起舞。

sentences.english: The backlit user interface only lights up as you approach the M100.
sentences.chinese: 背光式的使用者介面只隨著你靠近M100而發亮。

sentences.english: It is also one of the three island groups in the country, along with Luzon and Visayas .
sentences.chinese: 這又是其中的三個島羣，在該國，隨著呂宋和米沙鄢。

sentences.english: Following the yeasty music, we dance.
sentences.chinese: 我們，隨著熱情的音樂，起舞。

sentences.english: The series of changes that occur in an ecosystem with the passing of time.
sentences.chinese: 隨著時間所發生在生態系中的系列變化。

sentences.english: With the quickly developing of network communication, more and more network neology come forth.
sentences.chinese: 隨著網路傳播的迅速發展，湧現出了大量網路新詞語。

sentences.english: The elevator is a replacement of the old one commissioned with the opening of the library in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 電梯是更換1991年隨著圖書館開業而啓用的舊機。

sentences.english: He awoke to the ringing of an electric bell.
sentences.chinese: 他隨著一陣電鈴的響聲醒來。

sentences.english: With a swoop of his shining ax, the first tree fell.
sentences.chinese: 隨著他手上閃亮的斧頭揮下，第一棵樹應聲而倒。

definition: to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
